text: Nika Kiladze ( 29 November 1988 - 7 October 2014) was a Georgian footballer. He played professionally in both Georgia and Finland from 2006 until his death in 2014. He played as a defensive midfielder for Orbebi Tbilisi, Kokkolan Palloveikot (KPV), Kajaanin Haka, and FC Guria Lanchkhuti. Kiladze was born in Gagra, Abkhaz ASSR, Georgian SSR of the Soviet Union. Kiladze died in a motorcycle accident on 7 October 2014 in Tbilisi. He was 25. ==References== ==Other websites== * Nika Kiladze at the Football Database * Nika Kiladze at Tranfermarkt Category:1988 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Footballers in Georgia (country) Category:Road accident deaths
title: Nika Kiladze
